EmailTemplate.subject: Let Pivotal guide your transformation journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We’re back from the whirlwind that was Gartner Catalyst, and we hope you had as much fun as we did!
Thanks for your interest in Pivotal, and letting us learn about your business. We’re excited to help companies that are ready to take advantage of the opportunities facing IT organizations today. Whether you’re just embarking on a cloud journey, or looking to completely transform your IT architectures and processes to be more Agile and DevOps oriented, Pivotal can usher you on that journey. Start today with a free trial of Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=menu&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=gettingstartedwithpcf]]>.
If you missed our session Allstate: Anatomy of a Technological and Cultural Transformation, be sure to catch it via Gartner Events on Demand <[[http://www.gartnereventsondemand.com/session-video/CATUS7/SPS35]]> when it is available—we think you’ll enjoy it. To hear more customer stories, and for more information on how Pivotal is transforming how the world builds software, check out the recorded sessions from Pivotal’s — <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx">SpringOne Platform conference<span style=]]>t <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]>hey cover a wide range of topics from Cloud Native Architectures, to Java, Data Microservices, DevOps, and much more.
Finally, take advantage of our library of resources:
- 3 Rules to Follow When Adopting Big Data in the Cloud <[[https://medium.com/data-state-of-mind/3-rules-to-follow-when-adopting-big-data-in-the-cloud-30ee05368428#.28b894f7y]]> by Dormain Drewitz, which includes take-aways from Gartner Catalyst - Data Lakes: The Lure of the Cloud <[[https://medium.com/data-state-of-mind/data-lakes-the-lure-of-the-cloud-66bf69b2f1fe?source=latest]]> by Jeff Kelly - Recipe for Smart Applications <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/a-recipe-for-smart-applications]]> by Jeff Kelly - Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]> Webinar On-Demand - Perfecting the Software Life Cycle <[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/perfecting-the-software-life-cycle]]> Webinar On-Demand - How Important is Platform and Cloud Portability? <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]> Webinar On-Demand - O’Reilly eBooks <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/1/ebooks]]> including the ones from our booth
We hope you find these resources informative and inspiring!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
